level.heading: The board.
level.text: ยง 24-179 The board. (a) The board shall be convened by the chairperson or in his or her absence a deputy commissioner or at the request of any three members thereof. (b) If a member of the board has presided over the initial hearing, he or she shall not be disqualified from reviewing the hearing. (c) Five members of the board, at least two of whom shall not be city officials, shall constitute a quorum.
